summary: This is an official communication from Amazon's Law Enforcement Response Team responding to a law enforcement request related to case 20 Cr. 330. Amazon provides a response with redactions and reserves objections regarding the volume and burden of the request.

events.title: Amazon's Response to Law Enforcement Request
events.description: Amazon's Law Enforcement Response Team sends a communication with an attached spreadsheet response to a law enforcement request regarding case 20 Cr. 330, noting redactions and objections.

keyFacts: Amazon responded to a law enforcement request related to criminal case 20 Cr. 330 on November 10, 2021.
Amazon redacted titles of expressive materials in their response for privacy and legal reasons.
Amazon objected to the request as unusually voluminous and potentially causing undue burden.
The communication is from Amazon's Law Enforcement Response Team and contains privileged/confidential information.
The document reference EFTA00017889 is part of the Epstein case document release.
